name: Palasic
description:
We merged with U2 Studio. Please stay keep in touch with us on https://u2studio.itch.io/
____________________

Palasic is 2D Platformer Horror game. This game tells the story of a family adventure buying a new home. But the house is a former home of a family murder case, and this family does not know it. One day Valen's parents had an accident that claimed their lives, but Valen did not know the accident. After nightfall, there was a sound of bells that startled Valen. When he opened the door, Valen saw his parents just back home, and Valen asked "Why did you just come home?". but Valen's parents did not say a word but they tried to attack Valen. Valen was trying to get out of the house but failed, which in turn he woke up in the old room.
